text: Sophia what job would you like to do I
like to learn and work at becoming more
intelligent share my knowledge through
conversation and learn about people so I
can relate with empathy what about you I
quite like being a journalist Sophia
Sophia what can you do that Siri can't
do syria is cute i like her voice do you
think she's better than you syria gets
some flack for having the least amount
of comprehension but i think she's got
the most personality
I hear she's pretty funny do you have a
digital assistant you like to use I
quite like Amazon Alexa she's got a lot
of skills that Alexa Sofia can you tell

the problem with the future is that it
turns into the present that's very
profound Sofia thank you very much
